tn.ref: deciding to celebrate the Passover in the second month
tn.text: The Israelites normally celebrated the passover during the first month of the Hebrew calendar. The first month is during the last part of March and the first part April on Western calendars.

This is the second month of the Hebrew calendar. It is during the last part of April and the first part of May on Western calendars. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_hebrewmonths]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])
See how you translated this in [[:en:bible:notes:2ch:14:01|14:2]]
